coordinates.description: A three-element tuple containing latitude and longitude and altitude

items.description: Altitude in meters. May be positive or negative for above and below sea level measurement.

bearing.description: Object bearing (or course) in degrees true North

speed.description: Object speed in meters per second

time.description: Unix timestamp from when measurment was recorded (in seconds since 1st of January 1970).

accuracyBearing.description: Object bearing (or course) accuracy in degrees.

accuracySpeed.description: Object speed accuracy in meters per second.

floor.description: Contains information about the logical floor that object is on in the current building if inside a supported venue. Nil if floor is unavailable. It's estimated value based on altitude and may not refer to actual building.
